messages.content: This is no ordinary General Election. The choice on December 12th is not left vs right, but Leave vs Remain. Do you want a Brexiteer or a Remainer MP in your local area? It's a straight choice between The Brexit Party and Jeremy Corbyn's Remainer Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money, fishing and defence
Let's make Parliament serve the people.
More doctors, less waste, no privatisation, end the postcode lottery on health
Freed from EU rules we can cut energy bills and make food and clothing cheaper
Spend £100bn on transport schemes and jobs in the Regions
We need a fair points-based system, blind to ethnic origin

mentions.tacticalSituation: Leavers, don't waste your vote. Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: We are standing against Labour and the Remain alliance across the country. Without the Brexit Party, there can be no real Brexit.
issues.government: Fundamental Democratic Reform. Let's make Parliament serve the people.
issues.health: Investing in the NHS: More doctors, less waste, no privatisation, end the postcode lottery on health.
issues.immigration: Controlled immigration: We need a fair points-based system, blind to ethnic origin.
issues.transport: A Brexit Dividend: Spend £100bn on transport schemes and jobs in the Regions.
issues.socialWelfare: Cutting the Cost of Living: Freed from EU rules we can cut energy bills and make food and clothing cheaper.

community.content: There are around 130 parliamentary seats the Conservatives have not won in the last 50 years and will not win in this election. In many of these, a vote for the Conservative will risk letting in another Labour MP who wants a second referendum. The Brexit Party is the only party that can beat Corbyn's Remainer Labour.

quotes.text: The Brexit crisis has demonstrated Parliament's attempt to stop the Remainers' second referendum plot, finally deliver the Brexit 17.4m voted decided, and strike a big blow for democracy.

examples: Freed from EU rules we can cut energy bills and make food and clothing cheaper
Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour.
Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.
This is no ordinary General Election. The choice on December 12th is not left vs right, but Leave vs Remain.
More doctors, less waste, no privatisation, end the postcode lottery on health
We need a fair points-based system, blind to ethnic origin.
Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour
Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.
Fundamental Democratic Reform. Let's make Parliament serve the people.
Investing in the NHS: More doctors, less waste, no privatisation, end the postcode lottery on health.
Nigel Farage, Leader of The Brexit Party
The Brexit crisis has demonstrated Parliament's attempt to stop the Remainers' second referendum plot, finally deliver the Brexit 17.4m voted decided, and strike a big blow for democracy.

There are around 130 parliamentary seats the Conservatives have not won in the last 50 years and will not win in this election. In many of these, a vote for the Conservative will risk letting in another Labour MP who wants a second referendum.
The choice between The Brexit Party and Jeremy Corbyn's Remainer Labour.
